name: Greed Is Good(Or Maybe Not)
description:
This Game is about surviving in a house from zombie waves, and a little bit more than that too. We all have or had in one point in our lives, that thing which we can't live without or it seems so important that we can't let it go. whilst that is just an illusion.

Sometimes the thing you think is good/necessary for you is the very same thing causing you pain and suffering and you don't even know it yet.

And it is possible to break free from this illusion...
